# Nathan Ziegler

 

[City Council](https://www.postfalls.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)  
Title: City Council Seat 4  
[Email Nathan Ziegler](mailto:nziegler@postfalls.gov)

Term of Office: 2022 through 2025

## Overview

"I am a Post Falls native, graduating from Post Falls High School in 1994. I have a great sense of hometown pride, having experienced the caring and gracious nature of our residents for so many years. I am humbled by the trust my neighbors have vested in me to represent them at the Council, and will endeavor to represent them in a fair and thoughtful manner. I am a dedicated advocate for community interests by embedding conservative principles in policy decisions, development initiatives, and long-term planning."

Nathan Ziegler was elected to City Council Seat 4 in 2022. He is currently serving his first term on the Council.

Nathan is a proud Post Falls native with a passion for serving his community. He holds a B.S. in Healthcare Administration from Western Governors University and is a certified chaplain of hospice and palliative care, having earned his certification from CSU-San Marcos.

Nathan has been married to his wonderful wife, Danna, for 22 years. Together, they have four children ranging in age from 19 to 15.
